name: Isolate Devices
description: Isolates the specified devices. When you isolate a device, communication to and from the device is denied.

device_ids.description:
List of IDs of devices to isolate.
Example: "cb509c17-7b88-461a-ba3b-3d43e29e6cd4","2c13685e-7d1f-4726-9ad3-5c8fa7718bab"

exclusion_programs.description: List of programs to exclude from isolation and allow to communicate normally.

customized_message.description: Text to show in an alert message on the isolated devices

hide_customized_alert.description: Indicates whether to hide the customized alert message on isolated devices.

processed_device_ids.description: List of IDs of the isolated devices
